KeyId.description: The unique identifier for the customer master key (CMK) for which to cancel deletion. To specify this value, use the unique key ID or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CMK. Examples:   Unique key ID: 1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab   Key ARN: arn:aws:kms:us-east-2:111122223333:key/1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab   To obtain the unique key ID and key ARN for a given CMK, use ListKeys or DescribeKey.
